subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|alt=卜,要,勃-Min Dong,剝-Min Dong}}
From the grammaticalization of {{och-l|發|to send out; to go forth; to proceed}} ({{zh-ref|Tu, 2017}}).

subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=よく
|kanon=よく
|kun=ほ-し.い, ほっ-する, ほり-す
}}

{{attention|ja|see html comment}} <!--
from earliest page revisions by anon:

* '''Readings'''
** '''[[On]]''': [[よく]] (yoku)
** '''[[Kun]]''':　1. [[ほしい]] (hoshi-i)
** 　　　2. [[ほっする]] (hos-suru) < [[ほりす]] (hor-i-su)
** 　　　3. [archaic] [[ほる]] (hor-u)
** '''[[Manyō-gana]]''': [[よ]] (yo) [back-vowel variant(甲類)]

* '''Other info''': This character was sometimes used to phonetically transcribe the Old Japanese word for "night" (yo). [c.f. Manyōshū : 4134]
-->

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: This character was sometimes used to phonetically transcribe the Old Japanese word for “night” (yo). [cf. Manyōshū : 4134]
